name: HyperBac Compressed File Archive
summary: Learn about .HBC2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HyberBac compression is used for compressing database files, such as Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, SharePoint, Sybase, and other database files. The compression can provide up to a 90% reduction in required storage space.

description: Compressed file archive created with the HyperBac compression utility; similar to a standard .HBC file, but tuned for lower compression and faster decompression times.
